sense.def:
To make or draw an analogy
med dvema stvarema pomeni pokazati, da sta sorodni.

seg.quote: He made an analogy between parental and judicial discipline.

sense.def:
To explain something by analogy
pomeni, da tisto razložimo z opisovanjem nečesa drugega, sorodnega.

seg.quote: The models are meant to show, by analogy, how matter is built up.
